ref: 13124 sadyōja ʻ freshly born ʼ Pāṇ.gaṇa, sadyṓ jātá -- RV., sadyōjāta -- PañcavBr., m. ʻ new -- born calf ʼ, ˚tā -- f. ʻ a woman who has recently given birth ʼ lex. [sadyás, ja -- ]
L. sajjā ʻ fresh ʼ, sajjī sūī ʻ recently calved (of a cow) ʼ;
A. xã̄zo ʻ fresh, not kept overnight, purified by morning bath ʼ;
B. sã̄jo ʻ newly made, fresh ʼ. -- See also sajya -- .
